hints.text: 🥛 I give you milk.
🐄 I am big and often black and white.
🌾 I eat grass in a field.

animal.question: I say 'Woof!' and wag my tail. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to play fetch.
🏡 I am a good friend and guard your house.
🐕 I have four legs and a wet nose.

animal.question: I like to eat carrots and hop around. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I have long ears.
🐇 I live in a burrow.
🌱 I like to eat vegetables from the garden.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am a very big animal.
💧 I can use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I roar loudly and I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a big mane.
🥩 I am a carnivore.
🦁 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I quack and swim in a pond. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I have webbed feet.
🥚 I lay eggs.
🍞 People sometimes feed me bread.

animal.question: I climb trees and eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I like to swing from branch to branch.
🌴 I live in the jungle.
🙊 I make a 'ooh ooh aah aah' sound.

animal.question: I hiss and slither on the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I have no legs.
🥚 I lay eggs and shed my skin.
🌿 Some of my relatives are venomous.

animal.question: I have a hump and live in the desert. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐪 I can go for a long time without water.
🏜️ People use me to travel across the desert.
☀️ I am known as the 'ship of the desert'.

animal.question: I carry my home on my back and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I like to eat leafy greens.
🐢 I am a reptile.
🐢 I can hide inside my shell.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am cold.
🏠 You might see me covering houses in winter.
⛄ You can build a man out of me.

weather.question: I am hot and bright, and I come out during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I can make you feel warm.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.
🌻 Plants need me to grow.

weather.question: I am wet, and I fall from the sky. Sometimes you need an umbrella when I'm around. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 Plants need me to drink.
☔ You might wear a raincoat when I'm here.
🌧️ I can make puddles.

weather.question: I can be gentle, or I can be strong. I can make the leaves dance in the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I move the leaves.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
🌬️ I am air moving quickly.

weather.question: I'm a big, white, fluffy thing in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain, and sometimes I block the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like a sheep.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.
🌫️ I am made of water droplets.

weather.question: I am a colorful arc in the sky, formed after it rains. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
🍀 Some people think there's gold at my end.
☀️ You can only see me when the sun and rain are together.

weather.question: I am very loud and bright! You see me in the sky during a thunderstorm, then hear me roar. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I'm a flash of light.
⛈️ I come with thunder.
🌃 You often see me during a nighttime storm.

weather.question: I am the loud rumble you hear after lightning. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 I make a big boom!
🌩️ I follow lightning.
👂 You can hear me from far away.

weather.question: I am frozen rain that falls from the sky, sometimes bouncing when I hit the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am like ice, but smaller.
⚾ Sometimes I'm as big as a ball!
🌧️ I fall from the sky like rain.

weather.question: I'm a swirling storm with strong winds and lots of rain, but I'm not a tornado. I form over warm ocean waters. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have a name, like a person!
🌊 I can cause big floods near the ocean.
💨 I am a very big, rotating storm.
